Name: Unify
About the game: Unify is a simple top down shooter, designed to increase players reflexes, accuracy and game sense. Unify is made to fit the player as it can be played as a slow relaxing game used to wind down with or it could be used to train the player to become a rapid reflex sharpshooter. Compare stats with your friends to show who is the faster shooter and who can conquer unify. The single player round based games allows you to switch off and focus on your speed and precision. The relaxing song Nocturne in E flat major, Op. 9 no. 2 fills your ears as you are immersed in the high intensity gameplay. Test your skills and push your limits with Unify.
